sentences.en: An elevator mechanic can work the machinery directly by turning this lever.
sentences.cn: 电梯修理工可以转动这根杠杆直接操作机器。

sentences.en: China will host an exhibition of international garment machinery.
sentences.cn: 中国将主办国际服装机械展览会.

sentences.en: Every few minutes the motor cut out as the machinery became jammed.
sentences.cn: 机器老是卡住，马达隔不了几分钟就突然熄火。

sentences.en: Has the machinery been put up ready for the broadcast?
sentences.cn: 广播器材安装完毕了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had interfaced all this machinery with a master computer.
sentences.cn: 他把所有机器连接到了一台主计算机上。

sentences.en: He stayed the work and had the machinery removed.
sentences.cn: 他把工作停下来,让人把机器搬掉.

sentences.en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentences.en: Machinery ought to be well maintained all the time.
sentences.cn: 机器应该随时注意维护.

sentences.en: Machinery was often unprotected and accidents were frequent.
sentences.cn: 机器常裸露着，因此事故频仍。

sentences.en: Office machinery is kept to a minimum.
sentences.cn: 办公室的机器数量维持在最低限度。

sentences.en: Oil is put in machinery to reduce the friction.
sentences.cn: 把油涂到机器上减少摩擦.

sentences.en: On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentences.cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentences.en: The court is ineffective because it lacks the necessary enforcement machinery.
sentences.cn: 法院效率低是因为缺乏必要的执行机制.

sentences.en: The full state and police machinery ground into action.
sentences.cn: 全州所有机构和警察部门已经开始行动了。

sentences.en: The old machinery was still going strong.
sentences.cn: 这台旧机器依然运转良好。

words.tran_cn: 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人
机械工；机械师；机械安装修理工

trans.tran_cn: 机器，机械装置，组织，机构，体制
trans.tran_en: You can use machinery to refer to machines in general, or machines that are used in a factory or on a farm
